mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CLUB_APPLY WHERE PROFILE_NICKNAME = #{profileNickname} AND CLUB_NUMBER = #{clubNumber}
DELETE FROM CLUB_MEMBER WHERE PROFILE_NICKNAME = #{profileNickname} AND CLUB_NUMBER = #{clubNumber}
